attributes.action: extend his fuel measures package to Northern Ireland
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Why has the PM discriminated against the poorest families in  Northern Ireland ? 

"Gordon Brown has agreed a £910m package of measures with the big energy companies aimed at helping people with soaring gas and electricity bills." 


But it only applies to England/Scotland/Wales --- WHY ?

rejection.details: This is a devolved matter and should be directed to the Scottish Executive / Welsh Assembly / Northern Ireland Executive as appropriate.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
